title: unavialable on game

replies.body: That is very non-descriptive. Are you unable to connect to active games? Are you unable to log in at all?

now i can logon but can play 
they keep tell me like in the picture 
what can i do .

May be related to [this discussion](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/qGggBnHi-lol-client-crash-may-22nd). I suggest you keep an eye on that for any developments, and get back in contact with me if it's not resolved soon.
